channel.title: Adversarial Attacks (적대적 공격) on Research Agent Knowledge Base
channel.description: Recent content in Adversarial Attacks (적대적 공격) on Research Agent Knowledge Base

item.title: Targeted Manipulation: Slope-Based Attacks on Financial Time-Series Data
item.description: Abstract A common method of attacking deep learning models is through adversarial attacks, which occur when an attacker specifically modifies the input of a model to produce an incorrect result. Adversarial attacks have been deeply investigated in the image domain; however, there is less research in the time-series domain and very little for forecasting financial data. To address these concerns, this study aims to build upon previous research on adversarial attacks for time-series data by introducing two new slope-based methods aimed to alter the trends of the predicted stock forecast generated by an N-HiTS model.
